name: Table
description: Represents a table in a Word document.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Gets all of the table rows.

properties.name: isUniform
properties.description: Indicates whether all of the table rows are uniform.

properties.name: tables
properties.description: Gets the child tables nested one level deeper.

properties.name: nestingLevel
properties.description: Gets the nesting level of the table. Top-level tables have level 1.

properties.name: parentTableCell
properties.description: Gets the table cell that contains this table. Throws if it is not contained in a table cell.

properties.name: parentTableCellOrNullObject
properties.description: Gets the table cell that contains this table. Returns a null object if it is not contained in a table cell.

properties.name: parentTable
properties.description: Gets the table that contains this table. Throws if it is not contained in a table.

properties.name: parentTableOrNullObject
properties.description: Gets the table that contains this table. Returns a null object if it is not contained in a table.

properties.name: values
properties.description: Gets and sets the text values in the table, as a 2D Javascript array.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Gets or sets the style name for the table. Use this property for custom styles and localized style names. To use the built-in styles that are portable between locales, see the "styleBuiltIn" property.

properties.name: styleBuiltIn
properties.description: Gets or sets the built-in style name for the table. Use this property for built-in styles that are portable between locales. To use custom styles or localized style names, see the "style" property.

properties.name: rowCount
properties.description: Gets the number of rows in the table.

properties.name: headerRowCount
properties.description: Gets and sets the number of header rows.

properties.name: styleTotalRow
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the table has a total (last) row with a special style.

properties.name: styleFirstColumn
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the table has a first column with a special style.

properties.name: styleLastColumn
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the table has a last column with a special style.

properties.name: styleBandedRows
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the table has banded rows.

properties.name: styleBandedColumns
properties.description: Gets and sets whether the table has banded columns.

properties.name: shadingColor
properties.description: Gets and sets the shading color.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Gets and sets the horizontal alignment of every cell in the table. The value can be 'left', 'centered', 'right', or 'justified'.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Gets and sets the vertical alignment of every cell in the table. The value can be 'top', 'center' or 'bottom'.

properties.name: font
properties.description: Gets the font. Use this to get and set font name, size, color, and other properties.

properties.name: parentContentControl
properties.description: Gets the content control that contains the table. Throws if there isn't a parent content control.

properties.name: parentContentControlOrNullObject
properties.description: Gets the content control that contains the table. Returns a null object if there isn't a parent content control.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Gets and sets the width of the table in points.

properties.name: parentBody
properties.description: Gets the parent body of the table.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Gets or sets the alignment of the table against the page column. The value can be 'left', 'centered' or 'right'.

methods.name: addRows
methods.description: Adds rows to the start or end of the table, using the first or last existing row as a template. The string values, if specified, are set in the newly inserted rows.
methods.signature: addRows(insertLocation: string, rowCount: number, values: string[][])

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. It can be 'Start' or 'End'.

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Required. Number of rows to add.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: addColumns
methods.description: Adds columns to the start or end of the table, using the first or last existing column as a template. This is applicable to uniform tables. The string values, if specified, are set in the newly inserted rows.
methods.signature: addColumns(insertLocation: string, columnCount: number, values: string[][])

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. It can be 'Start' or 'End', corresponding to the appropriate side of the table.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Required. Number of columns to add.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: getCell
methods.description: Gets the table cell at a specified row and column. Throws if the specified table cell does not exist.

parameters.name: rowIndex
parameters.description: Required. The index of the row.

parameters.name: cellIndex
parameters.description: Required. The index of the cell in the row.

methods.name: getCellOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the table cell at a specified row and column. Returns a null object if the specified table cell does not exist.

parameters.name: rowIndex
parameters.description: Required. The index of the row.

parameters.name: cellIndex
parameters.description: Required. The index of the cell in the row.

methods.name: mergeCells
methods.description: Merges the cells bounded inclusively by a first and last cell.
methods.signature: mergeCells(topRow: number, firstCell: number, bottomRow: number, lastCell: number)

parameters.name: topRow
parameters.description: Required. The row of the first cell

parameters.name: firstCell
parameters.description: Required. The index of the first cell in its row

parameters.name: bottomRow
parameters.description: Required. The row of the last cell

parameters.name: lastCell
parameters.description: Required. The index of the last cell in its row

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the entire table.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Clears the contents of the table.

methods.name: deleteRows
methods.description: Deletes specific rows.

parameters.name: rowIndex
parameters.description: Required. The first row to delete.

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Optional. The number of rows to delete. Default 1.

methods.name: deleteColumns
methods.description: Deletes specific columns. This is applicable to uniform tables.

parameters.name: columnIndex
parameters.description: Required. The first column to delete.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Optional. The number of columns to delete. Default 1.

methods.name: autoFitWindow
methods.description: Autofits the table columns to the width of the window.

methods.name: distributeColumns
methods.description: Distributes the column widths evenly. This is applicable to uniform tables.

methods.name: getBorder
methods.description: Gets the border style for the specified border.

parameters.name: borderLocation
parameters.description: Required. The border location.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Selects the table, or the position at the start or end of the table, and navigates the Word UI to it.

parameters.name: selectionMode
parameters.description: Optional. The selection mode can be 'Select', 'Start' or 'End'. 'Select' is the default.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search with the specified searchOptions on the scope of the table object. The search results are a collection of range objects.

parameters.name: searchText
parameters.description: Required. The search text.

parameters.name: searchOptions
parameters.description: Optional. Options for the search.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Gets the range that contains this table, or the range at the start or end of the table.

parameters.name: rangeLocation
parameters.description: Optional. The range location can be 'Whole', 'Start', 'End' or 'After'.

methods.name: insertContentControl
methods.description: Inserts a content control on the table.

methods.name: insertTable
methods.description: Inserts a table with the specified number of rows and columns. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.
methods.signature: insertTable(rowCount: number, columnCount: number, insertLocation: string, values: string[][])

parameters.name: rowCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of rows in the table.

parameters.name: columnCount
parameters.description: Required. The number of columns in the table.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Optional 2D array. Cells are filled if the corresponding strings are specified in the array.

methods.name: insertParagraph
methods.description: Inserts a paragraph at the specified location. The insertLocation value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

parameters.name: paragraphText
parameters.description: Required. The paragraph text to be inserted.

parameters.name: insertLocation
parameters.description: Required. The value can be 'Before' or 'After'.

methods.name: getCellPadding
methods.description: Gets cell padding in points.

parameters.name: cellPaddingLocation
parameters.description: Required. The cell padding location can be 'Top', 'Left', 'Bottom' or 'Right'.

methods.name: setCellPadding
methods.description: Sets cell padding in points.

parameters.name: cellPaddingLocation
parameters.description: Required. The cell padding location can be 'Top', 'Left', 'Bottom' or 'Right'.

parameters.name: cellPadding
parameters.description: Required. The cell padding.

methods.name: getNext
methods.description: Gets the next table. Throws if this table is the last one.

methods.name: getNextOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the next table. Returns a null object if this table is the last one.

methods.name: getParagraphBefore
methods.description: Gets the paragraph before the table. Throws if there isn't a paragraph before the table.

methods.name: getParagraphBeforeOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the paragraph before the table. Returns a null object if there isn't a paragraph before the table.

methods.name: getParagraphAfter
methods.description: Gets the paragraph after the table. Throws if there isn't a paragraph after the table.

methods.name: getParagraphAfterOrNullObject
methods.description: Gets the paragraph after the table. Returns a null object if there isn't a paragraph after the table.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
